insert into transactions (user_id, fund_code, trade_type, trade_date, trade_time, nav, shares, amount, fee, status, created_at, updated_at, note) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nav,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
